content: the wild petal bag is a fun summery project made from flower squares with pretty eight-petalled blooms it s a great stash-buster for your favourite dk yarns and is perfect for adding a bit of colour and boho charm to your summer outfits this versatile design can be customised to suit your style make the full-size version with a long shoulder strap for a relaxed over-the-shoulder look or opt for the smaller version with a short strap or handle for a sweet little handbag perfect for both adults and kids whether you re heading to the beach a festival or just out and about **yarn type** any dk weight yarn can be used for this project you will only need one ball of each colour used **other materials you may need** 3 5mm hook measuring tape yarn needle scissors **bag size** finished small bag measures approximately 7 x 7 not including strap and the finished large bag measures approximately 14 x 14 not including strap
